articles.title: Oil alliance OPEC+ extends collective crude production cuts into 2025 - CNBC
articles.description: The influential Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries and its allies on Sunday agreed to extend official crude output cuts into 2025.

articles.title: Bajaj Auto sales remain flat in May 2024 at 3.55 lakh units - Upstox

articles.title: Hero Splendor Plus Xtec 2.0 – Top five highlights - BikeWale
articles.description: Hero MotoCorp recently launched the updated Splendor Plus Xtec in India as the 2.0 version. The Splendor has been a household name in the commuter market and is well-known nationwide for being a trusty bike.
